title: How to change the font colour for previously searched
content:
I think a recent update changed this issue as it was fine for a long time.
The issue I'm having is in relation to not being able to see recommendations or search history from within the pixel search widget. Hopefully the screenshots will show you better.

In the below example I started to type "peak" and as you can see the first 4 results are impossible to read ( this is search history) the peaky blinders is not history, as I've never visited that page.

So my question is, how do I make the history query's visible again?

They never used to be this hard to read.

Many thanks
